READ THIS TO LEARN HOW TO USE CUSTOM CODES AND LOAD MENU

####
A custom code is just a series of timings with "," in between. For example 1500,500,1000,500,500,1000
After each number the CC1101 changes state, if it was transmitting before then it will not transmit for the duration of the current number and vice-versa.
It always starts by not transmitting, simply because when you record a code it starts by not transmitting.
Each number represents a time in microseconds

So here we have 1500us pause, then 500us transmission, then 1000us pause etc...

A behaviour to keep in mind :
To transmit for a long time, eg 173000us you would have : 1500,64000,64000,45000,...,
1500 is the starting pause before transmitting, 173000us transmission is made of two 64000 and 45000, because 173000 is too big of a number for the variable type used.

So the transmission doesn't change when a 64000 is detected. You might see this when you dump some of your recorded codes.


####
Converting Flipper zero .sub files to be used with IO868 :

guideline : 
-remove all of the text, replace "-" signes with nothing, and replace spaces with ",". 
-Add an arbituary number at the start, eg 1500.  (Flipper always transmits first wheras here so always take a pause firs)
-Make sure you have no more than 2048 numbers (count a max of 2047 ",")

Then add your custom code like this : uin16_t signal_custom[] = {1500,399,377,32700,662,...,...};
(to replace the - and spaces with , and everything, microsoft word can be used or any other text editor with replace function)

Example :



#You start with :
Filetype: Flipper SubGhz RAW File
Version: 1
Frequency: 315000000
Preset: FuriHalSubGhzPresetOok270Async
Protocol: RAW
RAW_Data: 399 -377 32700 -662 391 -400 389 -438 385 -408 387 -408 387 -408 387 -408 385 -408 387 -408 387 -408 387 -410 387 -408 387 -410 387 -1170 419 -410 385 -376 815 -778 415 -384 811 -778 811 -782 425 -376 797 -802 799 -794 797 -796 797 -794 797 -796 401 -380 799 -392 407 -794 801 -402 365 -820 403 -396 789 -404 395 -394 393 -794 407 -396 397 -396 791 -406 415 -768 787 -396 409 -796 801 -800 403 -368 423 -398 393 -396 791 -406 395 -788 407 -396 791 -1192 409 -404 379 -406 803 -776 413 -384 805 -786 789 -822 399 -382 793 -786 821 -792 797 -794 795 -796 793 -796 397 -380 795 -404 411 -802 773 -406 379 -798 411 -396 793 -408 395 -394 395 -794 407 -394 395 -396 791 -404 379 -798 809 -406 395 -790 803 -796 401 -380 399 -410 407 -380 803 -410 379 -802 415 -358 799 -1202 391 -400 389 -436 779 -806 379 -418 779 -810 781 -784 395 -410 795 -802 801 -798 797 -794 795 -792 795 -798 401 -382 801 -388 409 -792 799 -402 397 -788 405 -396 791 -404 395 -394 395 -792 403 -380 401 -410 805 -378 411 -802 773 -408 393 -794 805 -802 403 -380 401 -420 355 -418 783 -416 385 -818 385 -408 395 -1186 403 -398 393 -396 395 -396 397 -396 397 -396 397 -396 397 -392 401 -392 401 -392 403 -392 437 -358 433 -378 407 -1200 383 -378 411 -410 777 -810 413 -378 803 -774 805 -802 403 -398 791 -802 797 -796 795 -794 795 -798 799 -794 401 -368 817 -398 379 -794 807 -402 379 -796 409 -380 831 -376 411 -406 379 -802 413 -378 407 -388 807 -382 391 -796 805 -404 379 -796 805 -802 403 -396 395 -396 397 -396 795 -404 395 -788 403 -380 801 -1200 411 -408 355 -438 779 -810 379 -418 777 -812 779 -788 395 -410 795 -802 799 -796 795 -794 799 -794 797 -796 397 -380 795 -404 379 -832 775 -404 393 -790 407 -398 791 -404 395 -394 395 -792 407 -396 397 -394 793 -406 377 -800 805 -404 395 -792 803 -800 401 -382 401 -420 355 -418 783 -418 385 -814 385 -408 793 -1194 397 -388 379 -438 777 -806 381 -416 777 -812 783 -784 395 -410 797 -802 799 -796 795 -794 797 -798 797 -794 399 -370 819 -402 381 -796 789 -394 405 -812 399 -384 795 -390 407 -382 407 -796 407 -396 395 -396 795 -404 417 -770 787 -394 419 -792 781 -790 431 -384 399 -386 389 -420 779 -414 385 -782 417 -406 397 -1184 405 -398 395 -396 397 -396 395 -394 397 -394 399 -394 435 -356 435 -358 437 -358 437 -358 437 -358 437 -356 439 -1178 415 -356 437 -358 833 -776 403 -378 831 -772


#You end up with :

1500,399,377,32700,662,391,400,389,438,385,408,387,408,387,408,387,408,385,408,387,408,387,408,387,410,387,408,387,410,387,1170,419,410,385,376,815,778,415,384,811,778,811,782,425,376,797,802,799,794,797,796,797,794,797,796,401,380,799,392,407,794,801,402,365,820,403,396,789,404,395,394,393,794,407,396,397,396,791,406,415,768,787,396,409,796,801,800,403,368,423,398,393,396,791,406,395,788,407,396,791,1192,409,404,379,406,803,776,413,384,805,786,789,822,399,382,793,786,821,792,797,794,795,796,793,796,397,380,795,404,411,802,773,406,379,798,411,396,793,408,395,394,395,794,407,394,395,396,791,404,379,798,809,406,395,790,803,796,401,380,399,410,407,380,803,410,379,802,415,358,799,1202,391,400,389,436,779,806,379,418,779,810,781,784,395,410,795,802,801,798,797,794,795,792,795,798,401,382,801,388,409,792,799,402,397,788,405,396,791,404,395,394,395,792,403,380,401,410,805,378,411,802,773,408,393,794,805,802,403,380,401,420,355,418,783,416,385,818,385,408,395,1186,403,398,393,396,395,396,397,396,397,396,397,396,397,392,401,392,401,392,403,392,437,358,433,378,407,1200,383,378,411,410,777,810,413,378,803,774,805,802,403,398,791,802,797,796,795,794,795,798,799,794,401,368,817,398,379,794,807,402,379,796,409,380,831,376,411,406,379,802,413,378,407,388,807,382,391,796,805,404,379,796,805,802,403,396,395,396,397,396,795,404,395,788,403,380,801,1200,411,408,355,438,779,810,379,418,777,812,779,788,395,410,795,802,799,796,795,794,799,794,797,796,397,380,795,404,379,832,775,404,393,790,407,398,791,404,395,394,395,792,407,396,397,394,793,406,377,800,805,404,395,792,803,800,401,382,401,420,355,418,783,418,385,814,385,408,793,1194,397,388,379,438,777,806,381,416,777,812,783,784,395,410,797,802,799,796,795,794,797,798,797,794,399,370,819,402,381,796,789,394,405,812,399,384,795,390,407,382,407,796,407,396,395,396,795,404,417,770,787,394,419,792,781,790,431,384,399,386,389,420,779,414,385,782,417,406,397,1184,405,398,395,396,397,396,395,394,397,394,399,394,435,356,435,358,437,358,437,358,437,358,437,356,439,1178,415,356,437,358,833,776,403,378,831,772
